SA11n1134:4: yathoktamāryatathāgataguhyasūtre-catvāra ime mahārāja dharmā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ viśeṣagāmitāya saṃvartante'parihāṇāya ca |
SA11n1134:17: yena vīryeṇa kāyaladhutāṃ cittalaghutāṃ ca pratilabhate,
SA11n1134:31: sa jīvitahetorapi pāpaṃ karma na karoti |
SA11n1134:34: paramārthanītārtha gambhīrapratītyasamutpādanairātmyaniḥ sattvanirjīvaniḥ pudgalavyavahāraśūnyatānimittāpraṇihitalakṣaṇān sarvadharmān śrutvā śraddadhāti |
SA11n1134:61: yadebhirevendriyairupastabdho'navamardyo bhavati sarvamāraiḥ asaṃhāryo bhavati śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānābhyām |
SA11n1134:75: saṃkhyākalāpā na bhavati maitracittaḥ || iti || kā
SA11n1134:80: vandāmi (te) asamajñānaparā sadṛśo na te'sti tribhave virajā ||
SA11n1134:82: noṣṇīṣamīkṣitu tavāsti samo vibhrājate bhruvi tavorṇa mune ||
SA11n1134:84: kṛpayekṣase jagadidaṃ hi yayā vandāmi te vimalanetra jina ||
SA11n1134:85: jihvā prabhūta tanu tāmranibhā vadanaṃ ca chādayasi yena svakam |
SA11n1134:86: dharmaṃ vadan vinayase ca jagat vandāmi te madhurasnigdhagirā ||
SA11n1134:87: daśanāḥ śubhāḥ sudṛḍha vajranibhāḥ triṃśadṛśāpyaviralāḥ sahitāḥ |
SA11n1134:88: kurvan smitaṃ vinayase ca jagat vandāmi te madhurasatyakathā ||
SA11n1134:89: rūpeṇa cāpratisamo'si jina prabhayā ca bhāsayasi kṣetraśatān |
SA11n1134:90: brahmendrapāla jagato bhagavān jihmībhavanti tava te prabhayā ||
SA11n1134:92: īkṣan vrajasyapi yugaṃ bhagavan saṃkampayan dharaṇiśailataṭān ||
SA11n1134:93: kāyaśca lakṣaṇacitto bhagavan sūkṣmā cchavī kanakavarṇanibhā |
SA11n1134:96: tvaṃ sarvasattvakṛpa maitramanā vandāmi te paramakāruṇikam ||
SA11n1134:97: tvaṃ dānaśīlanirataḥ satataṃ tvaṃ kṣāntivīryanirataḥ sudṛḍhaḥ |
SA11n1134:98: tvaṃ dhyānaprajñaprabha tejadharo vandāmi te asamajñānadhara ||
SA11n1134:99: tvaṃ vādiśūra kugaṇapramathīṃ tvaṃ sihavannadasi parṣadi ca |
SA11n1134:100: tvaṃ vaidyarāja trimalāntakaro vandāmi te paramaprītikara ||
SA11n1134:104: nātmā na satva na ca jīvagatī dharmā marīcidakacadrasamāḥ ||
SA11n1134:107: rāgādibhiśca bahurogaśataiḥ saṃbhrāmitaṃ satata vīkṣya jagat |
SA11n1134:110: satatāturaṃ jagadavekṣya mune parimocayan vicarase kṛpayā ||
SA11n1134:112: mūḍhā adeśika anāthagatā tasya pradarśayasi mārgavaram ||
SA11n1134:113: ye te babhūvu purimāśca jinā dharmeśvarā jagati cārthakarāḥ |
SA11n1134:115: snigdhaṃ hyakarkaśa manojña varaṃ brahmādhikaṃ paramaprītikaram |
SA11n1134:118: śrutvā hi yāṃ niyuta sattvaśatāḥ yānatrayeṇa janayanti śamam ||
SA11n1134:119: tava pūjayā sukhamanekavidhaṃ divyaṃ labhanti manujeṣu tathā |
SA11n1134:120: āḍhayo mahādhana mahāvibhavo bhavate jagaddhitakaro nṛpatiḥ ||
SA11n1134:121: balacakravartyapi ca dvīpapatiḥ jagadāvṛṇoti daśabhiḥ kuśalaiḥ |
SA11n1134:122: ratnāni sapta labhate suśubhā tvayi saṃprasādajanako'pratimaḥ ||
SA11n1134:123: brahmāpi śakra api lokapatiḥ bhavate ca saṃtuṣita devapati |
SA11n1134:124: paranirmito'pi ca sa yāmapatiḥ tvatpūjayā bhavati cāpi jinaḥ ||
SA11n1134:125: evaṃ hyamogha tava pūjā kṛtā saṃdarśanaṃ śravaṇamapyasamam |
SA11n1134:126: bhavate jagadvividhaduḥkhaharaṃ spṛśate padaṃ ca paramaṃ virajam ||
SA11n1134:128: kṣeme śive viraji āryapathe pratiṣṭhāpayasi jagadbhagavan ||
SA11n1134:129: puṇyārthikasya tava puṇyanidhe satatākṣayā bhavati puṇyakriyā |
SA11n1134:130: bahukalpakoṭiṣu na yāti kṣayaṃ yāvaddhi na spṛśati bodhi varām ||
SA11n1134:131: pariśuddha kṣetra labhate ruciraṃ paranirmitābha sada prītikaram |
SA11n1134:132: śuddhāśca kāyavacasā manasā sattvā bhavantyapi ca kṣetravare ||
SA11n1134:134: svargāpavarga manujeṣu sukhaṃ labhate ca puṇyanidhi sarvajage ||
SA11n1134:135: kīrtiryaśaśca prasṛtaṃ vipulaṃ tava sarvadikṣu bahukṣetraśatān |
SA11n1134:136: saṃkīrtayanti sugatāḥ satataṃ tava varṇamāla pariṣatsu jināḥ ||
SA11n1134:138: śāntendriyā śamaratā bhagavan vandāmi te naravarapravara ||
SA11n1134:139: labdhā abhijña jina pañca mayā gagane sthitena te niśamya giram |
SA11n1134:140: bhavitāsmi vīra sugatapratimo vibhajiṣya dharmamamalaṃ jagataḥ ||
SA11n1134:142: puṇyaṃ yadarjitamidaṃ vipulaṃ jagadāpnuyādapi ca buddhapadam || iti ||
SA11n1134:143: athavā yathā āryadharmasaṃgītisūtre kathitam- punaraparaṃ buddhā bhagavanto mahatpuṇyajñānasaṃbhārā mahāmaitrīmahākaruṇāgocarā mahāsattvarāśeḥ trāṇabhūtā mahābhaiṣajyaśalyahartāraḥ sarvasattvasamacittā nityasamādhigocarāḥ saṃsāranirvāṇavimuktā yāvatsattvānāṃ mātāpitṛkalpāḥ samānamaitracittāḥ |
SA11n1134:144: pe | sarvalokānabhibhūtāḥ sarvalokasyālokabhūtā mahāyogayogino mahātmāno mahājanaparivārā viśiṣṭajanaparivārā anivāritadarśanaśravaṇaparyupāsanāḥ svasukhanirapekṣāḥ paraduḥkhapraśamanapriyā dharmapriyā dharmadharā dharmāhārā dharmabhiṣajo dharmeśvarā dharmasvāmino dharmadānapatayo nityatyāgābhiratā nityāpramattā nityavivekābhiratāḥ sarvatra tīrthasetubhūtā mahārājamārgaprakhyā yāvadasecakadarśanā buddhā bhagavantaḥ |
SA11n1134:148: atraiva dharmānusmṛtimāha-iha bodhisattvasyaivaṃ bhavati- ya ete buddhā bhagavanto'nantāparyantaguṇāḥ,
SA11n1134:149: ete dharmajā dharmapadā dharmanirmitā dharmādhipateyā dharmaprabhā dharmagocarā dharmapratiśaraṇā dharmaniṣpannāḥ |
SA11n1134:151: yānyapi laukikāni lokottarāṇi ca sukhāni santi,
SA11n1134:154: dharmagauraveṇa dharmapratiśaraṇena dharmaparāyaṇena dharmasāreṇa dharmānve[ṣiṇā] dharmapratipannena |
SA11n1134:156: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvasyaivaṃ bhavati- samo hi dharmaḥ,
SA11n1134:189: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyo hi dharmaḥ ākāśavanna kṣīyate na vardhate |
SA11n1134:208: atraivāha- saṃgho hi dharmavādī dharmavaraṇo dharmacintako dharmakṣetraṃ dharmadharo dharmapratiśaraṇo dharmapūjako dharmakṛtyakārī dharmagocaro dharmacāritrasaṃpannaḥ svabhāvaṛjukaḥ svabhāvaśuddhaḥ sānukrośo dharmānukāruṇikaḥ sadā vivekagocaraḥ sadādharmaparāyaṇaḥ sadāśuklakārītyādi |
SA11n1134:209: tatra bodhisattvasya saṃghamanusmarataḥ evaṃ bhavati- ya ete saṃghasya bhūtā guṇāḥ,
SA11n1134:210: ete mayā ātmanaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ ca niṣpādayitavyāḥ | iti ||
SA11n1134:222: yāvanto loka pāṣaṇḍāḥ sarvatra pravrajanti te |
SA11n1134:224: candrā vā bhonti sūryā vā śakrabrahmaprajeśvarāḥ |
SA11n1134:227: yena te sattva mucyante sukhī bhonti anāmayāḥ |
SA11n1134:237: sarvatra dharmaṃ deśenti tena ucyanti nāyakāḥ ||
SA11n1134:238: kāmabhogāṃ[śca] darśenti dhyānaṃ ca dhyāyināṃ tathā |
SA11n1134:239: vidhvastamāraṃ kurvanti avatāraṃ na denti te ||
SA11n1134:241: evaṃ kāmāṃśca dhyānaṃ ca abhūtaṃ te vidarśayī ||
SA11n1134:243: rāgāṅkuraṃ ca saṃlobhya buddhajñāne sthāpayanti te ||
SA11n1134:246: daridrāṇāṃ ca sattvānāṃ nidhānā bhonti akṣayāḥ |
SA11n1134:247: teṣāṃ dānāni dattvā ca bodhicittaṃ janenti te ||
SA11n1134:251: abhayaṃ teṣu dattvā ca paripācenti bodhaye ||
SA11n1134:255: ceṭā bhavanti dāsā vā śiṣyatvamupayānti ca ||
SA11n1134:256: yena yenaiva cāṅgena sattvo dharmarato bhavet |
SA11n1134:261: buddhairapi vadadbhistu guṇāntaḥ suvaco bhavet || iti ||
SA11n1134:264: mālyavicitra vikīrṇasamantāḥ te jinapūja karonti mahātmā ||
SA11n1134:266: cūrṇa vicitra vikīrṇa samantāt te jinapūja karonti mahātmā ||
SA11n1134:268: padma vicitra vikīrṇa samantāt te jinapūja karonti mahātmā ||
SA11n1134:270: hāra vicitra vikīrṇa samantāt te jinapūja karonti mahātmā ||
SA11n1134:271: raśmi pramuñci dhvajāgraviyūhā te dhvaja pāṇḍuralohitapītāḥ |
SA11n1134:273: dhvaja samalaṃkari te jinakṣetrāḥ te maṇijālavicitraviyūhā ||
SA11n1134:275: chatra dharenti tathāgatamūrdhne te yatha ekajinasya karonti |
SA11n1134:277: eṣa samādhi vikurva ṛṣīṇāṃ te jagasaṃgrahajñānavikurvā |
SA11n1134:289: śānta nirodha samādhimukhena yātuka caryamukhā jagatīye |
SA11n1134:290: yātuka dharmamukhāḥ pratiyantaḥ te tu samantavimokṣamukhena ||
SA11n1134:291: sattva vinenti yathāśaya loke ye tu samantavimokṣamukhena |
SA11n1134:292: sattva vinenti yathāśaya loke teṣa nimitta na śakya grahītum ||
SA11n1134:293: kenacideṣa samādhi vikurvāḥ tena ti vyūhata agrasamādhīḥ |
SA11n1134:295: cintiya darśayi sarva vinenti yatra durbhikṣa sudurlabha sarvam ||
SA11n1134:296: ye pariṣkāra sukhāvaha loke tatra ca sarvabhiprāyakriyābhiḥ ||
SA11n1134:297: dānu dadanti karonti jagārthaṃ te varabhojanapānarasāgraiḥ |
SA11n1134:302: te vararūpa surūpa sumedhāḥ uttamarūpa nidarśayamānāḥ ||
SA11n1134:306: ye catureva aśīti sahastrā yebhi jinā jagato'rtha karonti |
SA11n1134:309: sarvakriyāsu sahāya bhavitvā sattva vinenti sahāyamukhena ||
SA11n1134:311: tebhi sahāya sahanti ya pīḍāṃ sarvajagasya hitāya sukhāya ||
SA11n1134:312: yatra na niṣkramaṇaṃ na ca dharmo jñāyati raṇyagato naca mokṣaḥ |
SA11n1134:313: tatra tu rājyasamṛddhisahāya niṣkrama śāntamanā aniketāḥ ||
SA11n1134:316: te daśa carya prabhāvayamānā ācari dharma mahāpuruṣāṇām |
SA11n1134:317: sarvamaśeṣata carya ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvayamāna karonti jagārtham ||
SA11n1134:318: yatra mitāyuṣa sattva bhavantī saukhyasamarpita mandakileśāḥ |
SA11n1134:319: tatra jarārdita vyādhina pṛṣṭā darśayi mṛtyuvaśaṃ avaśātmā ||
SA11n1134:321: prajvalitaṃ jaravyādhigatamṛtyu loka nirdarśiya satva vinenti ||
SA11n1134:323: buddhamahātma tu sūcayamānāḥ buddhaguṇebhi karonti jagārtham ||
SA11n1134:324: te ca adeśa ṛdhyanuśāstī rūpadhiṣṭhānabalena samantāt |
SA11n1134:325: darśayamāna tathāgata ṛddhī ṛddhivikurvita sattva vinenti ||
SA11n1134:326: te vividhehi upāyanayehi loka vicāri karonti jagārtham
SA11n1134:327: loki alipta jale yatha padmaṃ prītiprasādakarā vicaranti ||
SA11n1134:330: grāmika nāyaka sārathi bhonti sārthika śreṣṭhika gṛhapati bhonti |
SA11n1134:332: te aṭavīṣu mahādruma bhontī auṣadha akṣayaratnanidhānāḥ |
SA11n1134:334: arciya santu tu loka viditvā karmavidhīṣu ajānaka satvāḥ ||
SA11n1134:337: vidya balauṣadhiśāstravicitrāḥ sarva prabhāvita tebhi ṛṣībhiḥ ||
SA11n1134:338: ye ṛṣiṇāṃ caraṇāḥ paramāgrā yatradhimukta sadevaku lokaḥ |
SA11n1134:339: ye vrata duṣkara ye tapaśreṣṭhāḥ sarvi prabhāvita tebhi vidūbhiḥ ||
SA11n1134:342: te tu ajīvika dharmacarāṇāṃ uttarikāṇa anuttarikāṇām |
SA11n1134:343: dīrghajaṭāna kumāravratānāṃ te[ṣva] pi ācariyā hi bhavanti ||
SA11n1134:345: cārika tīrthya daśa tritayānāṃ teṣvapi ācariyā hi bhavanti ||
SA11n1134:347: mūlaphalāmbucarā api bhūtvā dharma acintiya te paramāgrāḥ ||
SA11n1134:349: ye musaleśaya yuktivihārī teṣvapi ācariyā hi bhavanti ||
SA11n1134:350: yāvata bāhirakāḥ pṛthutīrthyā āśaya teṣvadhimukti samīkṣya |
SA11n1134:351: tīkṣṇa durāsad ugratapebhī tīrthika duḥkhaprahāṇa vinenti ||
SA11n1134:362: te yathasatya niruktividhijñā evamaśeṣata ye jinadharmā |
SA11n1134:363: dharmamacintiya vākyapathajñā deśayi eṣa samādhi vikurvā ||
SA11n1134:366: raśmi pramuñciya darśayamānā yāvata sattva vinānita raśmi |
SA11n1134:367: teṣu sudarśana bhoti amoghaṃ hetu anuttari jñānavarasya ||
SA11n1134:368: darśayi buddha vidarśayi dharma saṃgha nidarśayi mārga narāṇām |
SA11n1134:369: darśayi cetika te jinabimbā tena sudarśanaraśmi nivṛttā ||
SA11n1134:370: raśmi pramuñci prabhaṃkaranāmā yā prabha jihma karoti marūṇām |
SA11n1134:371: sarvarajaṃ ca tamaṃ ca hanitvā so prabha bhāsati lokahitānām ||
SA11n1134:372: tāya prabhāsaya codita sattvāste jinapūjapradīpa dharentī |
SA11n1134:373: te jinapūjapradīpa dharitvā lokapradīpakarā jina bhonti ||
SA11n1134:374: tailapradīpa dhṛtasya pradīpā dāru tṛṇā naḍaveṇu pradīpāna |
SA11n1134:376: raśmi pramuñci pratāraṇi nāmā tāya prabhāsaya codita sattvāḥ ||
SA11n1134:378: dūṣita saṃskṛta varṇita śāntī tena pratāraṇi raśmi nivṛttā ||
SA11n1134:379: raśmi pipāsavinodanināmā tāya prabhāsaya codita sattvāḥ |
SA11n1134:384: kāma vivarṇita varṇita dhyānā tṛṣṇavinodani tena nivṛtā ||
SA11n1134:385: prītikarī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita sattvāḥ |
SA11n1134:386: prītiphuṭā varabodhinidānaṃ cinta janenti bhaviṣya svayaṃbhū ||
SA11n1134:388: bhāṣita buddhaguṇāḥ sadakālaṃ prītikarī prabha tena nivṛttā ||
SA11n1134:389: raśmi pramuñci ratiṃkaranāmā tāya prabhāsaya bodhita sattvā |
SA11n1134:390: buddharatīrata dharmaratīrata saṃgharatīrata te sada bhonti ||
SA11n1134:392: labdhanupattikakṣānti labhanti codita smārita ye bahu sattvā ||
SA11n1134:393: buddhaanusmṛti dharmagaṇārye bodhi ya cittaguṇān vivaritvā |
SA11n1134:395: puṇyasamuccaya raśmiḥ pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita sattvā |
SA11n1134:396: dānu dadanti vicitramanekaṃ prārthayamānu anuttaru bodhiṃ ||
SA11n1134:397: āśaya pūritu yācanakānāṃ yajña nirargala tairyajamānaiḥ |
SA11n1134:398: sarvabhiprāyata dānu daditvā puṇyasamuccaya raśmi nivṛttā ||
SA11n1134:399: jñānabatī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita sattvāḥ |
SA11n1134:402: dharmapadārthavibhāṣaṇa kṛtvā jñānavatī prabha tena nivṛttā ||
SA11n1134:403: prajñapradīpaya osari raśmi tāya prabhāsaya codita sattvāḥ ||
SA11n1134:404: śūnya nisattva ajātavipannān otari dharma abhāvasvabhāvān ||
SA11n1134:406: dharma asvāmika śūnya nirīhān bhāṣati prajñapradīpa nivṛttā ||
SA11n1134:407: dharmavikurvaṇi raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita sattvā |
SA11n1134:409: dharmadharāṇa parigrahu kṛtvā dhārmikarakṣa karitva ṛṣīṇām |
SA11n1134:410: dharmaanugraha kṛtva jagasya dharmavikurvaṇi raśmi nivṛttā ||
SA11n1134:411: tyāgavatī yada raśmi vimuñcī tāya ya matsaracodita sattvā |
SA11n1134:412: jñātva anitya aśāśvata bhogān tyāgaratīrata te sada bhonti ||
SA11n1134:413: matsaradurdama sattva adāntā jñātva dhanaṃ supinābhrasvabhāvam |
SA11n1134:415: niṣparidāha ya osari raśmi tāya duśīlaya codita sattvā |
SA11n1134:416: śīlaviśuddhipratiṣṭhita bhūtvā cinta janenti bhaveya svayaṃbhūḥ ||
SA11n1134:417: karmapathe kuśale pariśuddhe śīla samādayi yadbahusattvān |
SA11n1134:418: bodhayi cittasamādapanena raśmi nivṛtta sa niṣparidāhaḥ |
SA11n1134:419: kṣāntiviyūha ya osari raśmi tāya ya akṣama codita sattvāḥ |
SA11n1134:420: krodhakhilaṃ adhimāna jahitvā kṣāntiratīrata te sada bhonti ||
SA11n1134:421: duṣkṛta kṣānti apāyamatīnāṃ citta akṣomita bodhinidānam |
SA11n1134:422: varṇita kṣāntiguṇāḥ sadakālaṃ tena nivṛtta sa kṣāntiviyūhā ||
SA11n1134:423: raśmi uttaptavatī yada muñcī tāya kuśīda ya codita sattvāḥ |
SA11n1134:424: yuktaprayukta triṣū rataneṣu pūja karonti akhinnaprayogāḥ ||
SA11n1134:425: [ yukta prayukta triṣū rataneṣu pūja karitva akhinnaprayogāḥ |]
SA11n1134:426: te catumārapathā atikrāntāḥ kṣipra spṛśanti anuttara bodhim |
SA11n1134:427: vīrya samādayi yadbahusattvān pūja karitva triṣū rataneṣu |
SA11n1134:428: dharma dharitva kṣayaṃgata kāle tena uttaptavatī prabha labdhā ||
SA11n1134:429: śāntikarī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya vibhrānta ya codita sattvāḥ |
SA11n1134:430: teṣu na rāgu na dveṣa na mohāḥ bodhita bhonti samāhitacittāḥ ||
SA11n1134:432: varṇita dhyāna praśānta araṇye śāntikarī prabha tena nivṛttā ||
SA11n1134:433: prajñaviyūha ya osari raśmī tāya duḥprajña saṃcodita sattvāḥ |
SA11n1134:434: satya pratītya vimokṣa naye'sminnindriya jñānagatiṃ gata bhonti ||
SA11n1134:436: sūryapradīpa samādhi labhitvā prajñaprabhāsakarā jina bhonti ||
SA11n1134:437: rājyadhanātmapriyaiḥ parityāgaiḥ dharma ya mārgita bodhinidānam |
SA11n1134:438: taṃ ca satkṛtya prakāśiya dharmaṃ raśmi nivṛtta sa prajñaviyūhāḥ ||
SA11n1134:439: buddhavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāya saṃcodita sattvāḥ |
SA11n1134:440: buddhasahastra aneka acintyān paśyiṣu padmavaneṣu niṣaṇṇān ||
SA11n1134:442: buddhabalāviprabhāvana kṛtvā buddhavatī prabha tena nivṛttā ||
SA11n1134:443: te'bhayaṃdada raśmi pramuñcī tāya bhayārdita sattva sa spṛṣṭāḥ |
SA11n1134:445: ye abhayena nimantrita sattvāḥ prāṇivadhāttu nivārita bhonti |
SA11n1134:447: sarvasukhāvaha osari raśmī tāya gilāna ya ātura spṛṣṭāḥ |
SA11n1134:450: phāṇita kṣīra madhū dhṛta tailān bhojanapāna daditva ya labdhā ||
SA11n1134:451: buddhanidarśani raśmi pramuñcī tāya sa codita āyukṣayānte |
SA11n1134:452: buddha anusmari paśyipu buddhaṃ te'cyuta gacchi sa buddhakṣetram ||
SA11n1134:453: kāla karonti ca smārita buddhā darśitaprītakarā jinabimbān |
SA11n1134:454: buddhagatāḥ śaraṇaṃ maraṇānte bhāsiya buddhanidarśani labdhā ||
SA11n1134:455: dharmaprabhāvani raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāya saṃcodita sattvā |
SA11n1134:456: dharma paṭhanti śṛṇvanti likhantī dharmaratī rata te sada bhonti ||
SA11n1134:457: dharmadurbhikṣaya dyotitu dharmo dharmagaveṣiṇa pūrita āśā |
SA11n1134:458: chanda janitva prayujya ya dharme bhāṣata dharmaprabhāvani labdhā ||
SA11n1134:459: ghoṣavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī buddhasutā paricodanatāyām |
SA11n1134:460: yātuka śabdapracāru triloke sarva tathāgataghoṣa śṛṇvanti ||
SA11n1134:462: sarvajage jinaghoṣarutārthaṃ niścari ghoṣavatī prabha labdhā ||
SA11n1134:463: te'mṛtaṃdada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita sattvāḥ |
SA11n1134:464: sarva pramāda ciraṃ prajahitvā sarvaguṇaiḥ pratipadyati yogam ||
SA11n1134:465: duḥkha aneka upadravapūrṇaṃ bhāṣita saṃskṛta nityamakṣemam |
SA11n1134:466: śāntinirodhasukhaṃ sada kṣemaṃ bhāṣayatā amṛtaṃdada labdhā ||
SA11n1134:467: raśmi viśeṣavatī yada muñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita sattvā |
SA11n1134:469: śīlata agra samādhita agro prajñata agra mahāmunirājā |
SA11n1134:470: yaḥ stuta varṇita bodhinidānaṃ tena viśeṣavatī prabha labdhā ||
SA11n1134:471: ratnaviyūha ya osari raśmi tāya prabhāsaya codita sattvāḥ |
SA11n1134:472: akṣara ratnanidhāna labhitvā pūjayi ratnavarebhi maharṣīn ||
SA11n1134:473: ratnavisarga jine jinastūpe saṃgrahi kṛtsnajanaṃ ratanebhiḥ |
SA11n1134:474: ratnapradāna karitva jinānāṃ raśmi nivṛta ya ratnaviyūhā ||
SA11n1134:475: gandhaprabhāsa ya osari raśmī tāya prabhāsaya codita sattvāḥ |
SA11n1134:476: ghrātva amānuṣa gandha manojñān buddhaguṇe niyutāni bhavanti ||
SA11n1134:483: raśmi prasādakarī yada muñcī pāṇitalopama saṃsthihi bhūmiḥ |
SA11n1134:484: śodhayato ṛṣi āśramastūpān tena prasādakarī prabha labdhā ||
SA11n1134:485: muñcati meghavatī yada raśmiṃ saṃsthihi gandha pravarṣati megham |
SA11n1134:486: stūpavarāṅgaṇa gandhajalenā siñciya meghavatī prabha labdhā ||
SA11n1134:487: bhūṣaṇavyūha pramuñcatu raśmīnnagna acela subhūṣaṇa bhontī |
SA11n1134:489: raśmi rasāgravatī yada muñcībhukṣita bhojya rasāgra labhantī ||
SA11n1134:490: bhojana pāna vicitra rasāgrān datva rasāgravatī prabha labdhā ||
SA11n1134:491: arthanidarśani muñcati raśmīn ratnanidhāna labhanti daridrāḥ |
SA11n1134:493: cakṣuviśodhani muñcati raśmīn andha tadā dṛśi rūpa vicitram |
SA11n1134:494: dīpapradāna jine jinastūpe cakṣuviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā ||
SA11n1134:495: śrotraviśodhani muñcati raśmīn śrotravihīna śruṇī pṛthu śabdān |
SA11n1134:496: vādyapradāna jine jinastūpe śrotraviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā ||
SA11n1134:497: ghrāṇaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn ghrāyi aghrāyitapūrva sugandhān |
SA11n1134:498: gandhapradāna jine jinastūpe ghrāṇaviśodhani raśmi nivṛttāḥ ||
SA11n1134:499: jihvaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn snigdhamanojñarutaiḥ stuti buddhān |
SA11n1134:500: vāca durukta vivarjita rūkṣā ślakṣaṇa udīrita raśmi nivṛttā ||
SA11n1134:501: kāyaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn indriyahīna suīndriya bhonti |
SA11n1134:502: kāyapraṇāma jine jinastūpe kurvata kāyaviśodhani labdhavā ||
SA11n1134:503: cittaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn unmatu sarva sacitta bhavanti |
SA11n1134:504: citta samādhivaśānuga kṛtvā citaviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā ||
SA11n1134:505: rūpaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn paśyiya cintiya rūpa narendrān |
SA11n1134:506: rūpakaśodhani citra samantāt stūpa alaṃkaratā pratilabdhā ||
SA11n1134:507: śabdaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn śabda aśabdata śūnya vijānī |
SA11n1134:509: gandhaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn sarva dugandha sugandha bhavantī |
SA11n1134:511: te rasaśodhani muñcati raśmīn sadviṣa nirviṣa bhonti rasāgrāḥ |
SA11n1134:513: sparśaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn kakkhaṭa sparśa mṛdū sukha bhontī |
SA11n1134:515: dṣya aneka mṛdū sukhasparśā saṃstari mārgi vrajanti jinānām |
SA11n1134:517: dharmaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn sarvata romata cintiya dharmān |
SA11n1134:518: niścarataḥ śruṇi lokahitānāṃ toṣayi sarvadhimukti jinānām ||
SA11n1134:520: dharmata nityasthitā gaganasthā sūcata dharmaviśodhani labdhā ||
SA11n1134:521: raśmi sukhāpramukhā iti kṛtvā ekatu romamukhāttu ṛṣīṇām |
SA11n1134:522: niścari gaṅgarajopama raśmī sarva pṛthagvidha karmaprayogāḥ ||
SA11n1134:523: te yatha ekata romamukhāto osari gaṅgarajopama raśmī |
SA11n1134:524: evamaśeṣata sarvatu romā deśa samādhi vikurva ṛṣīṇām ||
SA11n1134:525: yena guṇena ya raśmi nivṛttā tasmi guṇeṣu sahāyaka pūrve |
SA11n1134:526: teṣu tameva pramuñcati raśmiṃ jñānavikurvaṇa eṣa ṛṣīṇām ||
SA11n1134:527: teṣa ya puṇyasahāyaka pūrve yairanumodita yācita yebhiḥ |
SA11n1134:528: yebhi ca dṛṣṭa śubhopacitaṃ vā te ima raśmi prajānati teṣām ||
SA11n1134:529: ye ca subhoṣacittāḥ kṛtapuṇyāḥ pūjita yebhi punaḥ punaḥ buddhāḥ |
SA11n1134:530: arthika chandika buddhaguṇebhiḥ codana teṣa karoti ya raśmiḥ ||
SA11n1134:531: sūrya yathā jātyandha na paśyī no ca sa nāsti udeti sa loke |
SA11n1134:532: cakṣusameta udāgamu jñātvā sarva prayujya svakasvaka dharme ||
SA11n1134:533: evata raśmi mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ asti ca te itare ca na paśyī |
SA11n1134:534: mithyahatā adhimuktivihīnāḥ durlabha te ca udāramatīnām ||
SA11n1134:535: ābharaṇāni nipāna vimānāḥ ratna rasāyana gandhanulepāḥ |
SA11n1134:536: te'pi tu asti mahātmajanasya te ca sudurlabha kṛcchragatānām ||
SA11n1134:537: evata raśmi mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ asti ca te itare ca na paśyī |
SA11n1134:538: mithyahatā adhimuktivihīnāḥ durlabha te ca udāramatīnām ||
SA11n1134:539: yasyimu raśmiprabheda śruṇitvā bheṣyati śraddadhimukti prasādaḥ |
SA11n1134:540: tena na kāṅkṣa na saṃśaya kāryo nāṅga na bheṣyi mahāguṇaketuḥ ||
SA11n1134:544: kāyaparyaṅka parisphuṭa padmaṃ darśayi eṣa samādhi vikurvā ||
SA11n1134:546: sarva parīvṛta buddhasutebhī ye ca samādhyasamādhivihārī ||
SA11n1134:547: ye paripācita tena ṛṣīyāṃ sattva niṣpādita buddhaguṇeṣu |
SA11n1134:548: te parivāriya taṃ mahapadmaṃ sarva udikṣiṣu prāñjalibhūtāḥ ||
SA11n1134:549: te ca samāhita bālaśarīre vyutthihi yauvanavegasthitebhyaḥ |
SA11n1134:551: jīrṇaka vṛddhaśarīri samāhita vyutthihi śraddha upāsikakāyāt |
SA11n1134:553: bhikṣuṇikāya śarīri samāhita vyuthihi bhikṣu bahuśrutakāyāḥ |
SA11n1134:561: sarvata bhūtaśarīri samāhita vyutthihi ekatu romasukhātaḥ |
SA11n1134:562: ekatu romamukhasmi samāhita vyutthihi sarvata romamukheṣu |||
SA11n1134:563: sarviṣu romamukheṣu samāhita vyutthihi ekatu vālapathātaḥ ||
SA11n1134:564: ekatu vālapathasmi samāhita vyutthihi sarvata vālapathebhyaḥ ||
SA11n1134:565: sarviṣu vālapatheṣu samāhita vyutthihi te paramāṇurajātaḥ ||
SA11n1134:566: ekarajasmi samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi sarvarajebhya aśeṣam ||
SA11n1134:569: vṛkṣaphaleṣu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi raśmimukhebhi jinānām |
SA11n1134:573: vāyupathe tu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi bhūmitalātu mahātmā |
SA11n1134:574: bhūmitale tu samāhita bhūtvā byutthihi sarvatu devavimānāt ||
SA11n1134:575: sarvi tu devabalāna samāhita byutthihi te gaganānusmṛtīmān |
SA11n1134:577: kalpa acintya prabhāṣiyamāṇāḥ sarvajinebhi na śakya kṣayītum |
SA11n1134:578: sarvajinebhi ca bhāṣita ete karmavipāku jagasya acintyo ||
SA11n1134:579: nāgavikurvita buddhavikurvā dhyāyina dhyāna acintya vikurvā |
SA11n1134:580: te ca vaśe sthita aṣṭa vimokṣāḥ śrāvaka ekabhavī bahu bhontī ||
SA11n1134:581: bhūtva bahuḥ puna eka bhavitvā dhyāyati prajvalate gaganasmin ||
SA11n1134:582: te hi mahākaruṇāya vihīnā bodhianarthiku loka upekṣī ||
SA11n1134:583: darśayi kāyavikurva acintyā kasya na darśayi lokahitaiṣī |
SA11n1134:584: candra sasūrya nabhe vicarantau darśayi sarvadiśi pratibhāsam ||
SA11n1134:586: evamacintiya darśiyi rūpaṃ sarvadaśaddiśi te naravīrāḥ ||
SA11n1134:589: teṣu svarāṅgaruteṣu vidhijñā toṣayi sarvarutān svarutena |
SA11n1134:590: sā hi sarāga sadoṣa rutāvati sarvarute pratighoṣavidhijñā ||
SA11n1134:591: dhāraṇi dharmabalaṃ vaśiprāptā kaḥ sa na toṣi sadevakalokam |
SA11n1134:592: māyakaro yatha vidyavidhijño darśayi rūpa vicitra anantān ||
SA11n1134:594: māyakaro hi sarāgu sadoṣo toṣayi māyavikurvita lokam ||
SA11n1134:596: rāhu yathe[ṣa] ya nirmiṇi kāyaṃ kurvati vajrapade talabandham ||
SA11n1134:598: so'pi sarāgu sadoṣa samoho rāhu nidarśayi īdṛśa ṛddhī ||
SA11n1134:599: mārapramardana lokapradīpa kasya na darśayi ṛddhi anantā |
SA11n1134:600: paśya acintiya [ śakravi] kurvā devasurendraraṇasmi pravṛtte ||
SA11n1134:601: yātuka bimbara nekasurāṇāṃ tātuka nirmiṇi śakru svakāyān |
SA11n1134:603: eṣa gṛhyeta vajradharāṇāṃ saṃbhramu gacchisu sarvasurendrāḥ |
SA11n1134:604: netra sahastra bhayaṃkara darśī jvālapramuñcana vajra gṛhītam ||
SA11n1134:608: sarvajagasya aśeṣata trāṇaṃ akṣaya puṇya kuto na vikurvī |
SA11n1134:609: vāyuta saṃbhuta megha pravarṣī vāyuta megha punaḥ prasamentī |
SA11n1134:610: vāyuta sasya virohati loke vāyu sukhāvaha sarvajagasya ||
SA11n1134:611: so hi aśikṣita pāramitāsu buddhaguṇeṣu aśikṣita vāyu |
SA11n1134:612: darśayi lokavipāka acintyā kasya na darśayi te vara labdhā ||
